Frost UI

Frost UI is a small, stripped down, starter .psd for mobile UI design. I found that whenever I started on a new project, I always ended up getting rid of most of my previous design work and wittling things down to just a few basic views and UI elements. I created this tiny .psd to forego that experience and jumpstart UI template creation for me and for you. So feel free to grab it here for freebs.
